content: in this legal case a court in bari italy has made a final ruling regarding the inheritance of a property the court declared that ma who was born in venezuela is now the heir of im who was born in bitetto and passed away in 2012 as a result ma is now a coowner of an apartment and a parking garage the court determined that ma accepted the inheritance through his actions even though he did not explicitly declare it the court also noted that ma had previously suggested selling the property and splitting the proceeds to settle the dispute based on this evidence the court granted the plaintiffs claim and declared ma as a coowner of the property the defendant did not contest the ruling so the plaintiff was awarded the costs of the case the ruling was made by the honorary judge of the bari court and states that ma is now considered the heir of im the court has ordered the registrar of the inland revenue agency to transcribe the judgment and relieve them of any liability the ruling was made on october 24 2022 and filed in the registry on november 3 2022
